Reviews.Title: Securityman Summary
Reviews.Author: Ben Perez Jr
Reviews.Content: The system works very well. Video and Photos are well organized and visable. Shipping was on time and satisfactory. Would definitely recommend to someone looking for a dependable inexpensive unit.

Reviews.Title: Returned it
Reviews.Author: Paul H. Harrison
Reviews.Content: I bought this along with another camera. The distance was not far enough. The features of not being able to see all 4 screens at once was not going to work for me. It may work for someone that did not want to record more than one camera that was being viewed. I returned for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer!!!
Reviews.Author: FRANCINE R.
Reviews.Content: Thank You!!! Very Pleased with this camera!!!! I will be happy to do business with you again!!! I will be ordering another camera shortly!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Do-it-yourself (D.I.Y) easy to use and simple installation
Integrated digital video recorder, SD memory card not included
2.4GHz digital wireless recording system. No video cables required
Weatherproof (IP54) CMOS color camera for outdoor and indoor applications
Secure signal: neighbors cannot pick up the signal or listen in
ProductInfo.Name: Securityman DigiairWatch 4-Channel Wireless DVR with 1 Wireless Camera, Night Vision, Audio and SD Card Recorder (Black)
